name: Norsemen
description:
In Norsemen, as the leader of the Vikings, you have to travel to foreign lands and build settlements and forts. Lawspeaker are dispatched and hold meetings. Sufficient ships ensure supplies and provide resources.

Norsemen is an exciting Euro style game in the expert game range for 2-4 players with a fascinating mixture of resource management, worker placement, deck building and push-your-luck elements.

Gamefound campaign will start on August 20th 2024. You can follow the campaign here -->

https://gamefound.com/en/projects/skellig-games/norsemen

—description from the publisher
